question:
With reference to the launch of the Fit India Movement, consider the following statements:
  1. The movement was launched on occasion of National Sports Day.
  2. Khelo India Scheme launched an app to map fitness parameters of school children.
  3. Samagra Siksha Scheme promotes sports among students.
     Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The Fit India Movement was launched on occasion of National Sports Day as a people’s movement. National Sports Day is observed in memory of sportsperson Dhyan Chand on August 29th every year. The movement calls people to make fitness their lifestyle. Statement 2 is correct: Khelo India Scheme was launched in 2016 by merging pre-existing schemes like National Sports Talent Search Scheme. An app (Khelo India App) was launched in connection to it in February, 2019. It allows the mapping of fitness parameters of school students. Statement 3 is correct: Samagra Siksha Scheme was launched in 2018 as an ‘Integrated Scheme for School Education’. It was formed by merging Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan (SSA), Rashtriya Madhyamik Shiksha Abhiyan (RMSA) and Teacher Education (TE). It aims to promote involvement in yoga, sports and other physical co-curricular activities.
